remarks: Show that the composition of two functions is the identity function by applying both functions to each value of the domain of the first function.  (Contributed by AV, 15-Dec-2019.)
statement:
2fvcoidd.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> B ) $.
2fvcoidd.g $e |- ( ph -> G : B --> A ) $.
2fvcoidd.i $e |- ( ph -> A. a e. A ( G ` ( F ` a ) ) = a ) $.
2fvcoidd $p |- ( ph -> ( G o. F ) = ( _I |` A ) ) $.
$d A a $.
$d F a $.
$d G a $.
